name: Forest Roads. Niva
description:
Forest Roads. Niva

Become an unequalled driver of the Niva SUV, who is able to cut through the difficult rough terrain along forest roads. Your goal is to reach the finish line and get through the checkpoints as quickly as possible. The scenery, the beautiful forest landscapes and the natural phenomena will immerse you in the atmosphere of the game. High-quality graphics, sound and realistic controls will help you feel the speed and drive.

Official Home Page :  https://www.forestroadsniva.ru/ Created by NDG
